text: Kelly Clarkson shed some tears on her 36th birthday on Tuesday as her protege D. R. King was eliminated from The Voice. D. R., a 34 - year - old Ohio resident, was left in the bottom two of the top 12 after a vote from the public. He was left to sing for survival with a track he chose himself and went with The Temptations'1972 hit Papa Was A Rolling Stone. Birthday girl : Kelly Clarkson celebrated her 36th birthday on Tuesday with a live performance on The Voice along with her team members'I'm puzzled why you're even in the bottom two. D. R you have the sickest range on this show, you have so much soul, so much rock and roll. Please America, for my birthday, vote D. R.,'urged Kelly whose birthday
